Why the child never react to your voice and smile back?
Why the child doesn’t play with another child?
Why the child seems deaf and can’t speak very well?
Would you think of Autism?
And would you look for professional help?

Autism

Autistic Spectrum Disorder (ASD), with its prevalence increasing dramatically over past decades, brings severe burden on both families and the society.

Nowadays, the screening of ASD mainly bases on behavioral scale, neglecting the genetic and metabolic alterations.

Our project consists two parts: a test strip for domestic tests based on urinary matabolites and further, a parallel screening strategy that increases sensitivity.

They are just like stars in the sky
